price: (Sunã mãsu cẽwa) "Kuma bã mu sauka* Fãce da umuruin Ubangijinka (Muhammad). Shĩ ne da mulkin abin da ke a gaba gare mu da abin da ke a bãyanmu da abin da ke a tsakãnin wannan." Kuma** (Ubangijinka bai kasance wanda ake mantãwa ba.
arabic: وَمَا نَتَنَزَّلُ إِلَّا بِأَمۡرِ رَبِّكَۖ لَهُۥ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِينَا وَمَا خَلۡفَنَا وَمَا بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَۚ وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ نَسِيّٗا
footnotes: * 'Yan Aljanna sunã cewa ba mu sauka a waɗannan gidãje ba sai da umurnin Ubangijinka, kai mai karatu, A1lahne Mai mallakar kõme, kuma kõme ãyã ne mai nũni zuwa gare shi, sabõda haka bã a mantãwa da shi. ** Maganar Allah ce a bãyan maganar 'yan Aljanna dõmin ta'aƙĩbi da ƙãrin bayãni ga maganarsu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā natanazzalu illā bi-amri rabbika lahu mā bayna aydīnā wamā khalfanā wamā bayna dhālika wamā kāna rabbuka nasiyyan
